content.prompt: Vermeer’s genre painting of Woman Holding a Balance and Rachel Ruysch’s still life painting Fruit and Insects convey meaning in a similar way by

choices.label: including written text that provides a commentary on the depicted subject matter
using depictions of everyday objects to communicate a moral message
depicting allegorical scenes in the service of political propaganda
combining stylized animal and plant forms to create a primarily decorative effect

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
